meanings.definition: A scented ointment applied to the hair or scalp for grooming purposes.
meanings.sent1: She applied the pomades to her hair before going out.
meanings.sent2: The barber used different pomades to style his customers' hair.
meanings.sent3: The pomades smelled so good that even the pets were attracted to them.
meanings.sent4: Her hair glistened like the sun after she used the pomades.
meanings.sent5: The pomades transformed her unruly hair into a work of art.

meanings.definition: A substance used to style hair and give it a shiny appearance.
meanings.sent1: He bought a new pomades to try a different hairstyle.
meanings.sent2: The pomades made her hair look sleek and elegant.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child mistook the pomades for edible gel.
meanings.sent4: Her hair sparkled under the lights thanks to the pomades.
meanings.sent5: The pomades added a touch of glamour to her everyday look.
